name: Piñata Panic!
description:
(This is an arcade game I made during College that was nominated and submitted for the Bafta Young Game Designers Award)

Play as a Pinata Rabbit in the wild west where cacti come to life! Defend your town with your candy shooting revolvers but be careful where you eliminate cacti, they turn back into normal cacti when you do and block your path, costing time to shoot the normal cacti out of the way when you do!

Everything in this game including the pixel art, code, animations and music was all made by me, aside from the sound effects like the power up noise and the gun shot sound effect which I obtained from ZapSplat.com and FesliyanStudios.com
